name: Prince of Persia (2008)

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Prince of Persia/PrinceOfPersia_Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2005 win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /SP-
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
